lead_paragraph: European leaders are trying to determine whether political parties are using social media to deliberately disseminate propaganda.

headline.print_headline: Fake News Provokes Anxiety in Italy Ahead of Key Referendum
headline.main: Spread of Fake News Provokes Anxiety in Italy

snippet: European leaders are trying to determine whether political parties are using social media to deliberately disseminate propaganda....
abstract: Italian Prime Min Matteo Renzi expresses concern that fake news circulated over social media may influence European elections, including critical referendum on streamlining Italy's bureaucracy; leaders on both sides of Atlantic are investigating whether political parties or outside powers like Russia are using social media platforms to spread propaganda.
